thread.title: Lauri
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Lauri

author: Lauri
title: Lauri
text: Couldn't have had a better online shopping experience. Affordable prices, great variety in selection and free shipping abroad. Even got my order in just a week which is very good for an international delivery (to Finland). Only thing to improve would be to have more pictures of the products
